thread.title: UC Browser Dominates 50% of India’s Mobile Browsing Market
thread.title_full: UC Browser Dominates 50% of India’s Mobile Browsing Market - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: UC Browser Dominates 50% of India’s Mobile Browsing Market
text: UC Browser, which is one of the most popular mobile browsing solutions in the whole world and is developed by Chinese company UCWeb, has some great news to share with us this week. The company has announced it now holds dominion over more than 50% of the mobile browser market in India as of September 2015, referring to data compiled by Web traffic analysis tool Statcounter (as seen at »
